snippet: The Securities and Exchange Commission named Pamela A. Gibbs to head its recently created Office of Minority and Women Inclusion, fulfilling a mandate of the Dodd-Frank Act.
abstract: The Securities and Exchange Commission named Pamela A. Gibbs to head its recently created Office of Minority and Women Inclusion, fulfilling a mandate of the Dodd-Frank Act.

headline.main: A New Diversity Monitor for the S.E.C.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)
